title.rendered: How to easily find Maids without Agency for Maids in Gurugram?

content.rendered:
Tried an Agency for Maids in Gurugram?

Were they reliable? Or is it that you had no other option left?

Try Helpers Near Me this time. Save the exorbitant commissions and the hassles.

Connect with Full time Maids directly (or Full Day or a Part time Maids) without any middlemen.

HELPERS NEAR ME (HNM) helps you find & hire legally verified workers near you. The platform uses technology and a lot of groundwork to help you connect directly with workers without any middlemen or commissions. On the other end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to spread the platform’s accessibility to as many workers all over India as possible. 

After having tried all the options of finding a Maid, Cook or Babysitter, there’s one last solution that most of us living in Metro cities try – reaching out to an Agency for Maids in Gurugram!

And since the need to have a Maid is always urgent, we usually go ahead with the option that opens up in front of us.

So, what do you do when you reach out to the Agency for Maids?

  • First, you search for a ‘best agency for maids in Gurugram’ on the Internet
  • Or you find contacts of 1-2 nearby Agency for Maids through your references
  • Next, you call them and let them know your requirement
  • You so ask a few fundamental questions on whether you can rely on them or not
  • And most importantly, you check how long it would take for them to help you have a Maid or a Babysitter

The challenge of finding a reliable Maid is tough in bigger cities.

And therefore, we don’t dwell much into the details of the Agency for Maids, as long as the problem gets solved for us, in any manner it may be.

Historically, agencies for Maids in Gurugram & other cities have existed for years.

Even though it costs a few thousand, a few of them are good, offer great service, and are recognized by references.

But, there are plenty of agencies for Maids in almost every city in India who are not operating legitimately.

No wonder why we keep hearing stories like:

  • Maid ran away with valuables
  • The placement agency takes money, but Maid flees
  • Maid service agency duped a doctor in Gurugram
  • Citizen’s experiences with fake agencies

There are many such stories that we keep hearing from different parts of the city at different points in time.

These stories have become fairly common now.

Furthermore, if you have gone past the stage of finding a Maid through the Agency for Maids, there are many further challenges one has to deal with.

Some common challenges that you will face are:

1) Agencies are not completely transparent with you.

The agency for Maids in Gurugram that you deal with will never be entirely transparent in its procedures.

They never share the details of the Maid in absolute transparency.

2) There’s always doubt about their credibility & reliability.

A few questions that will always bother you are how credible is the agency for Maids. Will the Maid Agency ensure you get a reliable Maid? Can the agency guarantee a safe recruit?

Often the agency for Maids in Gurugram does not share the past credentials of the maids.

3) The financial transactions are mostly uncertain.

There’s always a question of whether the agency for Maids would give the Maid the right monthly salary.

Would the agency for maids provide the full amount you give them in the name of salary, or would they charge a hefty commission from the maid for her every month?

We often hear stories where the agencies charge exorbitant money from the customers but pay the Maids in peanuts.

4) For most of the agencies for Maids, every person is just a transaction.

It is rare to find an agency for Maids treating their maids with respect.

Some other essential questions emerge:

How do they find the Maids?

Are the Maids working with the agency willingly?

Or have they been forced to do the job of a Maid out of some liability or any hidden reason?

Are the Maids being treated as Working Professionals?

5) Are the Maids reliable?

It is very natural to be concerned about the Maid’s reliability.

Since the Maid will be with my family, children & elders for a long period and will have access to the entire house, it is essential that the new person is reliable enough and that I know her background in as much detail.

These challenges are always there, many before hiring a Maid and a few after.

Some of the doubts get answered; for rest, we all take a bit of risk and move on.

So, how do you find a Maid if you are not finding one easily?

Is there any way to ensure the Agency for Maids you are in touch with is legitimate?

How can you ensure the Agency for Maids does every bit of transaction diligently, deals with the Maids in the right way and is entirely transparent in dealing with you?

Most questions will always remain unanswered when dealing with an Agency for Maids.

However, the problem of finding a Maid does get answered in the easiest way possible.

Meet Helpers Near Me.

Helpers Near Me is a few years old, DIPP-recognized startup.

It has a platform that allows you the find a Maid, Cook, Babysitter and many such Domestic Helpers in the most efficient & legitimate way possible.

The platform also genuinely helps the Maid & other Helpers find jobs in their nearest locality without charging them any money.

Some of the unique features of Helpers Near Me are:

  • It is a legitimate DIPP-recognized startup (It is not an Agency for Maids!)
  • It has a digital platform where Maids, Cooks, Babysitters, Private Drivers & other Helpers join willingly on their own – Thousands of such Domestic & Workplace Workers are already a part of this movement
  • Helpers Near Me allows you to connect with Maids & Helpers directly – there are no Agents or Contractors in between
  • You can find multiple Maids around your search location at a nominal fee only. There are no further charges beyond this nominal fee
  • It is like a Search Engine of those Cab Apps wherein you can connect directly with multiple Maids around your search locality
  • The entire transaction takes about 5 minutes max, and you get to find multiple Maids on your mobile phone instantly
  • The transactions done here are safe & secure – payments are routed through known gateways like Paytm & Cashfree

To sum up, here are 4 solid benefits of trying Helpers Near Me when you need to find a Maid:

1) You will find Helpers Near Me Credible & Reliable.

The credibility of Helpers Near Me comes from the way the platform has created & built itself.

Helpers Near Me has created this platform for both the Helpers and us as Individuals so that everyone can solve each other’s problems in a fair way.

Directly, you can contact the Worker who needs a job as a Maid, Cook, Babysitter, Driver or others.

And you get to connect with multiple of them, not just one.

So, why reach out to an Agency for Maids in Gurugram or any other city?

And why pay the Agents & Contractors an extra amount of money & commissions every month?

Furthermore, every Maid & the Helper is professionally verified at Helpers Near Me. Right at the time when they become a part of the platform.

Helpers Near Me follows a professional 2/3 Step Verification process before connecting any Helper with its system.

Additionally, you also have an option to access the detailed report of the Maid’s background.

2) Helpers Near Me follows 100% transparency.

The platform maintains 100% transparency in its entire process.

You get to see the profile of Maids & Workers before you pay the nominal fee, not after.

There are no hidden charges beyond what you pay at the time of your order.

Within this nominal fee, you get to connect with multiple Maids.

Once connected, you have direct communication with the Maids or Helpers.

Once connected, there’s no interference from Helpers Near Me unless you need further help from the Customer Care team.

Furthermore, Helpers Near Me follows a 100% Refund Policy, which ensures your transactions are always safe.

So, at Helpers Near Me, you either get to find a Maid, or the platform refunds your money.

3) The Maids & Workers at Helpers Near Me always deserve respect.

Every Helper on Helpers Near Me carries their self-respect.

They join the platform of their own will.

Every Helper is given every right, like other Professionals, to look for the kind of work they want to do.

They also can remain ‘inactive’ on the platform if they want. Or be in an ‘active’ mode when seeking a job.

The Helpers are treated like working professionals on this platform.

And not a single rupee is charged for this entire service.

For every Helper, being a part of Helpers Near Me is free of cost.

4) The financial transactions at Helpers Near Me are always clean.

As mentioned above, there is direct communication between the Maids and you as a Customer.

Even the salary that you pay to the Maid goes directly to her.

There’s no intervention from Helpers Near Me after the platform has connected you with the Helper.

However, if you face any problem, the Customer Care team at Helpers Near Me is always there to resolve the concerns, most of them usually within 24 hrs.

5) At Helpers Near Me, you get to find reliable Maids & Workers:

As detailed earlier, every Maid & Helper is professionally verified at Helpers Near Me before becoming part of it.

Helpers Near Me follows a professional 2/3 Step Verification process before connecting any Helper with its system.

You also get an option to have a detailed report on the Maid’s background.

Furthermore, in every transaction, you connect with multiple Maids, and you get to pick & choose from all the options given.

So, technically, you get to choose the most reliable one out of the lot, and that too with a documented background report, if needed.

To summarize, Helpers Near Me helps you solve the problem of finding a Maid in the easiest way possible.

Similarly, it helps you find a Private Driver, Cook, Babysitter, Delivery Boy, Store Worker, Peon, and many others.

As far as an Agency for Maids are concerned, dealing with many still comes with a pinch of salt and your share of risk.

Quick Links:

To find & hire workers near you, try Helpers Near Me.

Try SalaryTracker. It is a free salary tracking tool for 100+ profiles of Workers near you.

Refer to some of our Customer Reviews. Find what they have to say about Helpers Near Me.

Legally Verify the credentials of your Maid, Driver, Security Guards, Babysitters, Cooks, Gardener or any other workers. Try the Professional Verification Services of Helpers Near Me.

Want to get quick answers to some of your questions? Read our FAQs section.

We recommend hiring workers from Helpers Near Me. Here’s why:

Helpers Near Me uses technology and a lot of groundwork to help you connect directly with workers without any middlemen or commissions.

On one end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. On the other, the digital infrastructure built around HNM makes it easy, quick, reliable & affordable for anyone to find & hire 100+ profiles of nearby workers.

With a vision to end poverty, forced labour, worker exploitation, and human trafficking, HNM is working towards building an unbiased and inclusive digital ecosystem where the underprivileged workforce of India can join the platform easily and access local employment free of cost, with or without smartphones.

HNM believes having enough local employment opportunities allows the workers to find a better working environment, better salaries and a chance to improve their and their families’ quality of life.

From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to make the platform accessible to as many workers in India as possible.

Find how many Workers have joined the movement to connect with YOU directly.

Many of the workers have also received local employment opportunities.
